column4: hi all .. would someone of you take me a little advice :: i have reinforced my good friend's computer by Linux instead of windows and everything works for him fine and in my opinion much better then in win, but one thing pain him and this could be for him true reason to fallback to windows >> we need to find some way, which will provide us support for MSN video+voice chat .. i have tried vmware but with no success.. everything else (cam, mic ..) i
ripikiet << amsn does not support IMHO voice+video
well, to my knowldge, thats the only way to get it to work.
